name: Developer Tools Toolkit
description: A collection of essential developer tools and shortcuts for macOS, including IDE launchers, git commands, and Docker controls.
author: Alex Johnson
content:
# Developer tools and IDE shortcuts
- key: "d"
  icon: "terminal.fill"
  title: "Developer Tools"
  submenu:
    - key: "x"
      title: "Xcode"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Xcode.app"
    - key: "v"
      title: "Visual Studio Code"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Visual Studio Code.app"
    - key: "i"
      title: "IntelliJ IDEA"
      action: "launch:///Applications/IntelliJ IDEA.app"
    - key: "g"
      title: "Git Commands"
      submenu:
        - key: "p"
          title: "Pull"
          action: "shell://git pull"
          notify: true
        - key: "s"
          title: "Status"
          action: "shell://git status"
          notify: true

name: Quick App Launcher
description: A simple app launcher for your most frequently used applications, organized by category with custom icons.
author: Sarah Miller
content:
# Quick app launcher by category
- key: "a"
  icon: "app.fill"
  title: "Applications"
  submenu:
    - key: "b"
      icon: "safari"
      title: "Browsers"
      submenu:
        - key: "s"
          title: "Safari"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Safari.app"
        - key: "c"
          title: "Chrome"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Google Chrome.app"
        - key: "f"
          title: "Firefox"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Firefox.app"
    - key: "p"
      icon: "doc.text"
      title: "Productivity"
      submenu:
        - key: "p"
          title: "Preview"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Preview.app"
        - key: "n"
          title: "Notes"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Notes.app"
        - key: "c"
          title: "Calculator"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Calculator.app"

name: macOS System Utilities
description: Essential macOS system controls and utilities, including display settings, sound controls, and power management options.
author: Michael Chen
content:
# macOS system utilities and controls
- key: "s"
  icon: "gearshape.fill"
  title: "System"
  submenu:
    - key: "d"
      icon: "display"
      title: "Display"
      submenu:
        - key: "n"
          title: "Night Shift Toggle"
          action: "shell://osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to set dark mode to not dark mode'"
          notify: true
        - key: "b"
          title: "Brightness Up"
          action: "shell://brightness up"
        - key: "d"
          title: "Brightness Down"
          action: "shell://brightness down"
    - key: "a"
      icon: "speaker.wave.3.fill"
      title: "Audio"
      submenu:
        - key: "u"
          title: "Volume Up"
          action: "shell://volume up"
        - key: "d"
          title: "Volume Down"
          action: "shell://volume down"
        - key: "m"
          title: "Mute Toggle"
          action: "shell://volume mute"
    - key: "p"
      icon: "bolt.fill"
      title: "Power"
      submenu:
        - key: "s"
          title: "Sleep"
          action: "shell://pmset sleepnow"
        - key: "r"
          title: "Restart"
          action: "shell://osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to restart'"
        - key: "o"
          title: "Shut Down"
          action: "shell://osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to shut down'"

name: Media Quick Controls
description: Media playback controls for various media players, including Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube.
author: Emma Wilson
content:
# Media playback controls for popular players
- key: "m"
  icon: "music.note"
  title: "Media Controls"
  submenu:
    - key: "p"
      icon: "play.fill"
      title: "Play/Pause"
      action: "shell://osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to playpause'"
    - key: "n"
      icon: "forward.fill"
      title: "Next Track"
      action: "shell://osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to next track'"
    - key: "b"
      icon: "backward.fill"
      title: "Previous Track"
      action: "shell://osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" to previous track'"
    - key: "s"
      icon: "speaker.wave.2.fill"
      title: "Spotify"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Spotify.app"
    - key: "a"
      icon: "music.note"
      title: "Apple Music"
      action: "launch:///System/Applications/Music.app"

name: Web Bookmarks Collection
description: A collection of useful website bookmarks organized by category, including news, social media, and productivity tools.
author: David Lee
content:
# Organized web bookmarks by category
- key: "w"
  icon: "globe"
  title: "Web Bookmarks"
  submenu:
    - key: "n"
      icon: "newspaper"
      title: "News"
      submenu:
        - key: "c"
          title: "CNN"
          action: "open://https://www.cnn.com"
        - key: "b"
          title: "BBC"
          action: "open://https://www.bbc.com"
        - key: "r"
          title: "Reuters"
          action: "open://https://www.reuters.com"
    - key: "s"
      icon: "person.2.fill"
      title: "Social Media"
      submenu:
        - key: "t"
          title: "Twitter"
          action: "open://https://twitter.com"
        - key: "l"
          title: "LinkedIn"
          action: "open://https://www.linkedin.com"
        - key: "r"
          title: "Reddit"
          action: "open://https://www.reddit.com"
    - key: "p"
      icon: "checklist"
      title: "Productivity"
      submenu:
        - key: "t"
          title: "Trello"
          action: "open://https://trello.com"
        - key: "n"
          title: "Notion"
          action: "open://https://www.notion.so"
        - key: "g"
          title: "Google Drive"
          action: "open://https://drive.google.com"
